dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the city of Nova Haven was bustling with life.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Alright team, we've received reports of a robbery at the local guild bank. Let's move out!

dialogues.speaker: Lila Earthsong
dialogues.text: Sir, I'm reading some weird energy signatures coming from inside the bank.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Everyone be careful. We don't know what we're up against yet.
